title: I Did Something Bad
lyrics: I never trust a narcissist<BREAKER>But they love me<BREAKER>So I play 'em like a violin<BREAKER>And I make it look oh so easy<BREAKER>'Cause for every lie I tell them<BREAKER>They tell me three<BREAKER>This is how the world works<BREAKER>Now all he thinks about is me
I can feel the flames on my skin<BREAKER>Crimson red paint on my lips<BREAKER>If a man talks shit, then I owe him nothing<BREAKER>I don't regret it one bit, 'cause he had it coming

They say I did something bad<BREAKER>Then why's it feel so good?<BREAKER>They say I did something bad<BREAKER>But why's it feel so good?<BREAKER>Most fun I ever had<BREAKER>And I'd do it over and over and over again if I could<BREAKER>It just felt so good, good

I never trust a playboy<BREAKER>But they love me<BREAKER>So I fly him all around the world<BREAKER>And I let them think they saved me<BREAKER>They never see it comin'<BREAKER>What I do next<BREAKER>This is how the world works<BREAKER>You gotta leave before you get left
I can feel the flames on my skin<BREAKER>He says, "Don't throw away a good thing"<BREAKER>But if he drops my name, then I owe him nothin'<BREAKER>And if he spends my change, then he had it comin'

They say I did something bad<BREAKER>Then why's it feel so good?<BREAKER>They say I did something bad<BREAKER>But why's it feel so good?<BREAKER>Most fun I ever had<BREAKER>And I'd do it over and over and over again if I could<BREAKER>It just felt so good, good

They're burning all the witches, even if you aren't one<BREAKER>They got their pitchforks and proof<BREAKER>Their receipts and reasons<BREAKER>They're burning all the witches, even if you aren't one<BREAKER>So light me up (light me up), light me up (light me up)<BREAKER>Light me up, go ahead and light me up (light me up)<BREAKER>Light me up (light me up), light me up (light me up)<BREAKER>Light me up (light me up), light me up (light me up)

They say I did something bad<BREAKER>Then why's it feel so good?<BREAKER>They say I did something bad<BREAKER>But why's it feel so good?<BREAKER>Most fun I ever had<BREAKER>And I'd do it over and over and over again if I could<BREAKER>It just felt so good, good
Oh, you say I did something bad<BREAKER>Then why's it feel so good, good?<BREAKER>So bad, why's it feel so good?<BREAKER>Why's it feel, why's it feel so good? (Bad)<BREAKER>It just felt so good, good
